title: Ticket #7632: Enable transplanting of jobs to another schedd
description:
We want to provide a new way to temporarily transplant a set of jobs from one schedd to another, and return them later. This is similar conceptually to Condor-C and the job router, but is different in some respects:

  • The two schedds are not co-located (as with the job router).
  • Jobs are not predetermined to be moved (as with Condor-C).
  • One-time movement of jobs in each direction, with no on-going update of job status and no communication between the two schedds (or related processes).
